title: Petro Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: Petro Oleksiiovych Poroshenko (born 26 September 1965) is a Ukrainian politician and oligarch who served as the fifth president of Ukraine from 2014 to 2019. He served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2009 to 2010, and as the Minister of Trade and Economic Development in 2012.

title: Petro Poroshenko | Facts & Biography | Britannica
snippet: Petro Poroshenko, businessman and politician who served as president of Ukraine (2014–19). In 1996 he founded the confectionery manufacturer Roshen and became one of the richest people in Ukraine.

title: Petro Poroshenko
snippet: On Thursday Ukrainian president Petro Poroshenko announced that Russian military forces had in fact invaded Ukraine. For the first time since Russia’s annexation of Crimea in March, Ukrainian officials alluded to Russia’s action as an invasion.
